Q_DESC:
Given a string S,we have to perform N steps. In each step we need to take the first character of the string and put it at the end of the string. We have to find out what will be the string after N steps. Consider the string as a queue and solve the problem.Example, consider the input string as: "abcd"and N=3; then output will be "dabc"

INPUT:
The first line of input consists of the length of the string L and it is followed by the string.The next line consists of integer N indicating the number of steps in which the first character of the string is put at the end of the string.

OUTPUT:
The string after Nth step should be printed.
